message.content: Yes, the authors include the full text of instructions given to participants and screenshots in the appendix section of the paper, particularly in Figures 13 and 14. This provides clear information about the tasks and evaluations conducted with human subjects through Amazon Mechanical Turk.

Yes, the authors have provided the full text of instructions given to participants and included screenshots of the interfaces used in their human performance study and evaluation of generated explanations (Figures 13 and 14 in the appendix). These details allow for a better understanding of the human study setup and how the evaluations were conducted using Amazon Mechanical Turk.

Yes, the authors included the full text of instructions given to the Amazon Mechanical Turk (AMT) workers for the human performance study and the evaluation of generated explanations in Figures 13 and 14 respectively in the supplementary materials (appendix B.2 and B.3).
